price: (28) And they have thereof no knowledge. They follow not except assumption, and indeed, assumption avails not against the truth at all.
arabic: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنۡ عِلۡمٍۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّۖ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ شَيۡـٔٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamā lahum bihi min ʿil'min in yattabiʿūna illā al-ẓana wa-inna al-ẓana lā yugh'nī mina al-ḥaqi shayan
